about.notes: Cycle the best available refresh over all configured targets by name.

actions.when: canUseSpell('Refresh II', 'Refresh') and partyByName(vars.refresh_cycle.targets) and not hasBuff(member, 'Refresh') and (member.is_player or member.mpp < vars.refresh_cycle.trust_mpp)
